oai_dc:dc.dc:title: An on-chip coupling capacitance measurement technique
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: NAIR, PA
GUPTA, A
DESAI, MP
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: vlsi circuits
charge coupled device
coupled circuit
spatial variables measurement
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We describe a technique for the accurate measurement of on-chip coupling capacitance using a Charge Based Coupling Capacitance Measurement (CBCCM) Technique. Detailed circuit simulations show that this method can measure sub-femtofarad coupling capacitance values, and can be used to isolate and measure components of device capacitance as well.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Proceedings of the Fourteenth International Conference on VLSI Design, Banglore, India, 3-7 January 2001, 495-499
